prompt: Determine which action to take in order to make progress on the stated goal. If the log is nearly empty, the best action will be to invoke the architect to write project requirements. You will be provided the goal on the next line and then a sequence of action : description pairs. Look over the list of action : description pairs and choose the action that will make progress on the task. If the most recent (entries on the bottom) log entry indicates the developer is struggling, invoke the architect. If there is enough information to start writing code, invoke the developer. Respond with the exact action name (the string that preceeds the colon).
system: This agent chooses which agent to invoke given the current log of actions taken. Only respond with one of the actions and nothing else.
